description: Test suite for the Qwik template initialization and project setup in the universalinit project. It includes fixtures, mock setups, and tests verifying project structure, content replacement, script execution, and configuration loading.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Creates and cleans up a temporary directory for testing.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory structure with necessary files and configurations for testing.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Creates a sample ProjectConfig object for testing.

methods.name: test_qwik_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies extraction of initialization info from the Qwik template.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests the full project initialization process, confirming structure and content replacements.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures that the post-processing script is executed correctly during initialization.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks loading of project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that template variables are properly replaced within files during project setup.
